lead_paragraph: The head of track’s global governing body said that claims of Qatari bribes in the bidding process for the 2017 world championships were being investigated.

headline.main: An Inquiry on Bribery Claims in Track Event Bidding

snippet: The head of track’s global governing body said that claims of Qatari bribes in the bidding process for the 2017 world championships were being investigated.
abstract: International Assn of Athletics Federations is investigating claims of bribery by Qatar in bidding for 2017 track and field world championships.
